svg.text: Comprehensive Analysis with Time Complexity & Implementations

g.text: Search through array elements one by one from start to end until target is found or array ends
return i # Found at index i
Algorithm: Divide and conquer - repeatedly divide search space in half
Searching for element 7 in sorted array:
Step 4: left=3, right=2 → left > right, element not found!
Wait... Let me correct the demonstration for element 7:
Corrected Step 3: left=2, right=2, mid=2, arr[2]=5
But 7 is actually at index 3! Let me show correct binary search:
Correct: Binary search finds 7 at index 3 in 3 steps
Binary much better for large n
Consider sorting cost vs search frequency
